prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek yellow body and a mysterious aura.
Show me a Pokemon that can manipulate objects with its mind and has unique psychic abilities.
Imagine a creature that can teleport and has a distinctive star-shaped tail.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and uses its psychic powers to navigate.
Give me a character that has a strong bond with its trainer and is fiercely loyal.
Generate a Pokemon known for its speed and agility, perfect for quick battles.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that has a playful nature and loves to explore.
